storyInfo: Led by Siege, the Exemplars arrive in Gibsonham, where Horn and Bagpipe reunite. Their reunion is abruptly interrupted by an unexpected visitor: the Duke of Gododdin.

attributes.content: Twenty-three hours into the operation...
The route ahead has been cleared.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'll continue scouting the Sarkaz army's movements. Haven't found any trace of them yet.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Thank you, Misery. Continue to set up those sentry posts.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Morgan, found any surviving Victorian soldiers where you're at?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm afraid not.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Nothing but Originium crystals here.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We haven't run into any Victorian troops, corpses, or wrecks since we entered the Westbound Forest.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Dammit! We can tell there's been a bloody huge battle, so where've all the people gone?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The terrain here keeps changing. Maybe the ground... ate them all up.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We cannot underestimate the tenacity of the people. It is only because there are those who refuse to give up that the Exemplars even exist.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's why we're here in the first place.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Shearer, keep the medics ready to receive any army remnants and civilians.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We've got extra supplies, so no need to worry on that front.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: The bad news is that with so many Infected among our troops now, it's almost impossible to distinguish between infected and uninfected soldiers.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: I'd like your professional opinion on that matter. Would registering the Infected help our men or not?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Funny you should ask. 'Registering the Infected'... That might have been the first thing they taught me at the military academy.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: But where we stand now, I'd say there's no real sense to it.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: I see. Then let's stop registering them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Just try your best to provide everyone, infected or not, with Rhodes Island's recommended protective measures.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The rest... is not up to us anymore, at least not for now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Let's all focus on surviving this war first. Then we can worry about the wars to come.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Oh, my drone's back.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: How awful, the entire propulsion system has been clotted up by crystal dust.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Based on monitored data, environmental Originium concentration is still fluctuating wildly.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Send me that data you just got, Rockrock. We've got a new iteration of our Originium activation trend model, and I want to see if our calculations fit real-world data.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ugh, looks like there's not enough data to do that. The trend of this curve... Let's wait for Viktor's team to finish off that diffractometer analysis report, then we should be able to calculate the safe areas in real-time.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This place freaks me out. It's like one minute it's deadly quiet, the next there's some terrifying Originium mountain pushing its way up out of the dirt. The safe areas keep changing.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Although we've managed to reestablish short-range comms after working our asses off, if you go even a step out of range, all that interference'll just get in the way again.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Good thing I planned ahead and asked Raidian for her Arts Unit before we left for Londinium. After a little copy and paste, I made a knockoff version. It's not as good as the real deal, but it should help.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Once we've got these portable communications towers up, we'll be able to transmit the locations of the safe areas to anyone on the battlefield who needs them.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This information will save many lives.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Well, yeah. That's what Rhodes Island does.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Horn, status update.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We've successfully arrived at Gibsonham. It's the last supply point before we reach the front at Silverrock Bluffs.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The reconnaissance team's already made their initial scouting report. Looks like there are traces of the ducal armies here. Must have passed through on the way to the front a few days ago.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I think we can confirm at this point that the route Trilby Asher provided is safe.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Is there anyone in town?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The streets are empty, but I can sense the flicker of shadows and the smell of food.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We decided against contact to avoid unneeded misunderstandings.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Understood. We'll rendezvous with you as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's getting dark.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Seems like everything's going smoothly. Best we let our fighters get some rest and some hot soup in them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Remember to save some for my team! They'll be taking a while longer to get back after their work is done. Rockrock and I still have to head over to Feist...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm not sure if we'll be able to double our communication range by nightfall, but we'll do our best to finish ASAP.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No need to worry, we'll save the best for your people.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...It's all just the same canned provisions though, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Would you like some engine oil for dressing then?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Oi!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hahahahaha!
attributes.name: Siege & Rockrock

attributes.content: All units, continue onwards until you reach Gibsonham.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I hope things can be as peaceful tonight as things are now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All the houses seem to be empty. Have the residents gone into hiding?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Gibsonham's not far from the dukes' defense line, so I doubt the Sarkaz ever fully captured it, not to mention that the ducal armies just passed through a few days ago.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Horn's caution is warranted, though. There might be some scattered ducal troops who want to reconvene with the main army and decided to camp out here first.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Although Trilby Asher's helping us out with his advice, Victoria's never exactly been a model for unity.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Not to mention the... complicated nature of the Exemplars. I dare say there are a few old-fashioned military nobles who would rather not tolerate our very existence.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I see, then let's show them the full scale of our forces. It'll deter those with ulterior motives and alert anyone who needs our help of our arrival.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The rumbling of traveling tanks reverberates through the quiet night, the low roar of the engines forceful yet steady.
The soldiers cautiously advance, observing their surroundings, but still, all they see are pitch-black windows and doorways.
It doesn't look like they want to make first contact.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: That's fine, as long as it means we can get along—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait, I hear something. From the building to the front and left.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That's the sound of artillery shell casings falling on the ground!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: An ambush?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: On your guard, everyone. I'll lead a team to scout ahead.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: First Squad, Second Squad, follow my lead!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: There are no signs of life in the abandoned factory.
Contrary to expectation, there is no sound of an explosion following the fallen casings.
Are you sure that was falling casings, Horn?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Absolutely sure. That's a special model only allocated to elite Victorian troops.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No traces of anyone living here—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Don't move, Siege.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Siege carefully puts her foot down back to where it was.
Horn points at a thin tripwire, barely visible against the ground.
Nicely concealed, what with the surrounding piping obstructing the view. Real tricky to spot.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: A booby trap?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No... It's not linked to any explosives, just a simple alarm system. Based on how they've installed it, I'd say they're military.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Should we try to initiate contact?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Yes. Everyone, get behind us, and prepare to engage.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hello, we don't mean any harm!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Our unit's called the—
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: A secret passage!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Get ready to enter! Stay behind my shield!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Halt!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We're not...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: H-Help!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier?

attributes.content: I knocked over some spent ammunition while on watch. How could they have heard from so far away?! They avoided your alarm, too!
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: These troops, I don't think they're any ordinary—
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: She... She can block your piledriver spear?
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: Captain? And Siege too?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It really is you, Fiona.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The lady with long, red hair suddenly throws herself into the arms of her captain.
So ye were alive all along...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Wonderful... how wonderful.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Horn gently releases Bagpipe from her embrace, then claps a hand on her shoulder.
Good to see you in one piece, and in rather good shape, too.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I-I'll make my report now, Captain! I've done it, I've managed tae extract the intelligence on the Spectre Force, and I ken what they're plannin' now!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I survived! I got my memories, I got the truth, and I stayed alive!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Yer orders... I never forgot a word of 'em.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Good to hear. I knew you could do it. I always knew.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Welcome back, Bagpipe.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Wait, she's...? You're not—
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: Everyone, we mean you no harm. It's alright to come out.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: One by one, silhouettes emerge from the shadows.
The elderly, children, the sick and the wounded, civilians.
Hundreds of pairs of eyes stare at Siege and her men in fear and curiosity, taking their measure.
You're not with the ducal armies?
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: M-Most of you aren't dressed like Victorian soldiers. In fact, you mostly look like workers to me?
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: That's right. We're not under any of the dukes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We're called the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Shearer's counting up the civilians who were hiding in the factory and giving them a check-up. All he can say at the moment is that it's looking better than we expected.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Aside from those infected soldiers under the Duke of Fife who came along with you, and a small team of military engineers under the Duke of Normandy, everyone else is just local civilians who couldn't escape.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The ducal alliance armies came through here a few days ago, but they rather give up a chance at being rescued than seek help from the Grand Dukes.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's understandable why the soldiers would avoid them. They're either worried about the status of their infection, or worried about a court-martial. But as for the civilians...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Perhaps this was the year the people living around Londinium got to reassess their country and those decorated higher-ups.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Bagpipe, how did you manage to get their trust—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: ...Are you listening, Bagpipe?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, er, aye, Captain!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You need to pay attention during tactical meetings. The map's on the wall, not my face.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Sorry, Captain!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Horn lets out a small sigh.
*sigh* I really shouldn't be asking. You are Fiona, after all.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm just... a wee bit glad.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The Exemplars, the Tempest Platoon's predecessors. I guess the rumors were true.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm actually amazed that you still remember what you learned in military history class.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Well of course! When I was still at trainin' camp, Triangle made sure I committed this fact to memory!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Out by the trainin' field, the sycamores were full o' leaves, blockin' the sun juuust right. Then there were the rocks at the top of the cliff, hard as, well, rocks. Hand'll sting if ye tried to climb them.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I remember when Cello and Oboe had a wager on who could complete the rock climbing training course the fastest. The loser had to do a hundred one-handed push-ups.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Oboe was a right fool! Who would've taken that bet wi Cello?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Maybe you should have reminded him back then. You were even sitting on his back the whole time he was doing those push-ups.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hehe. I was just helpin' him with his training. And I'd say it turned out alright in the end, aye? He was just a hair behind Cello the next time!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The Exemplars... When the Tempest Platoon was first established, nothing was left of this legendary unit from the War of the Four Nations, not even its unassigned unit ID.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But now, it has returned once more to the battlefield.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We're all members of the Exemplars now, Bagpipe.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: As long as our team is still here, we will never stop fighting the good fight.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Isn't there a strategy meeting inside? Why're you standing out here in the cold?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Just wanted to clear my head for a few minutes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Did you think I was someone else?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Baird, or...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No, not really.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I believe you. If someone suddenly popped out of the fog tonight, I wouldn't have any expectations either.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Not everyone is as lucky as Horn, reuniting with the person they most want to see.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: 'Luck' eh? That's a luxury around here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That's enough blues for tonight. We should head inside.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Victorian soldiers? Are they the remnants who stayed behind?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No, they can't be. I never noticed them until they got this close.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: They're the elite of the elites.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Caster's men?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Ah! It's positively frigid out here! My hands are frozen stiff.
The days truly are getting colder as they go by.
Why, I've only taken a little jaunt, and my full plaid's already half soaked through.
My young friends, won't you invite me inside to warm my hands for a spell?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Since you've come all this way in person, I suppose we should show you some courtesy.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Delphine—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes, Vina?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Let's show the duke the way.
attributes.name: Siege
